feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Fathom being thus informed of the suspicion under which he stood, could not help smiling at the eagerness with which the spectators flew upon him.

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Fathom being thus informed of the suspicion under which he stood, could not help smiling at the eagerness with which the spectators flew upon him.

Places.name: Inn
Places.description: The inn where the passengers used to eat their breakfasts.
